author: axic3354
content:
Nice work <@!386690701343326219> getting these out!

For context, here is the list queries originally collected by <@!259648573401071617>, <@!682078300234973185> and myself: https://notes.ethereum.org/yXRGmZAyTGW_rfuV1MC5ZA

It is currently a random mix of things people were interested in. Would be useful to set a few goals and brainstorm what queries need to be conducted to answer those goals.

author: mandrigin
content:
and that's me again, I moved some info out of the witness spec and added some introductory info to README.md
https://github.com/ethereum/stateless-ethereum-specs/pull/20

will continue to simplify/edit the witness spec

<@!682078300234973185> I think I will use your notation for our witness spec, because it is definitely more standard
